name: Fetz-Out II
overview: A punishingly fast single screen shooter where a wave of enemies cycle past you in a loop until you destroy them all and can move on to the next wave. Created by Ingo Sander and published in Magic Disk 64 1988/11, Digital Marketing PD #156. Fetz-Out 2 is a game that primarily depends on quick reactions. The game doesn't need much explanation. All you need is a joystick in port 2 and a quick response. When you have completed one level, you will move on to the next one. If your ship is destroyed, you have to start again from the beginning.
